title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar build 200201151. When searching for references to this field, the search results are not being selected.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not being selected.
EB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match should be selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, please follow these steps: 
1. Make sure you have JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE (and that you have the source for rt.jar)
2. Open the java.io.File class
3. Select the field 'tmpFir'
4. Search for references to this field
